name: The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout

steps.plaintext: Head to the designated location to look for clues about Ashvattha's Concourses
steps.markdown: Head to the designated location to look for clues about Ashvattha's Concourses

steps.plaintext: Observe the Sumeru Roses to find the hidden song
steps.markdown: Observe the Sumeru Roses to find the hidden song

steps.plaintext: Play the music according to the pattern of the roses
steps.markdown: Play the music according to the pattern of the roses

substeps.plaintext: The player can now use the Vintage Lyre on a Sprouting Branch to summon Healthy Dendrograna.
substeps.markdown: The player can now use the ◀Vintage Lyre▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Vintage_Lyre▷ on a ◀Sprouting Branch▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Sprouting_Branch▷ to summon ◀Healthy Dendrograna▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dendrogranum▷.

steps.plaintext: Unlock the road ahead using the Rhythm of the Sprout
steps.markdown: Unlock the road ahead using the Rhythm of the Sprout

steps.plaintext: Keep going and reach Ashvattha's Concourse
steps.markdown: Keep going and reach Ashvattha's Concourse

substeps.plaintext: There are Waverider Waypoints that the player can use to spawn a Waverider to get to the Withering Zone
substeps.markdown: There are Waverider Waypoints that the player can use to spawn a Waverider to get to the Withering Zone

steps.plaintext: Investigate the trees inside Ashvattha's Concourse
steps.markdown: Investigate the trees inside Ashvattha's Concourse

substeps.plaintext: Touch the tree to enter the quest domain The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout. Bringing along a bow user is recommended. The player can skip the next step if they touch the tree immediately.
substeps.markdown: Touch the tree to enter the quest domain ◀The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Rhythm_that_Nurtures_the_Sprout_(Domain)▷. Bringing along a bow user is recommended. The player can skip the next step if they touch the tree immediately.

steps.plaintext: Talk to Arama and enter the Vasara Tree's dream
steps.markdown: Talk to Arama and enter the ◀Vasara Tree▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Vasara_Tree▷'s dream

steps.plaintext: Explore the dream of the Vasara Tree
steps.markdown: Explore the dream of the Vasara Tree
